messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] eliminating injection pain (was Vaccination)
messages.msgSnippet: we haven t use homeopathy, but we get emla cream and use it prior to an injection to ease the pain.  My 5 yo j ust had his first injection (tetanus) and didn t
messages.messageBody:
we haven't use homeopathy, but we get emla cream and use it prior to an
injection to ease the pain. My 5 yo j ust had his first injection
(tetanus) and didn't complain about pain at all either during or after.


dawn h-s

" "I am a woman here on planet Earth
I have the breath of life in me, a gift given at birth
No one, no body, no powers that be
Can ever, ever, ever take this gift away from me."
--Ruth Pelham

messages.subject: eliminating injection pain (was Vaccination)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/22/2000 8:44:26 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Michelle, I d love to know more about your remedy.  Care to share? Thanks, Carron
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/22/2000 8:44:26 AM Central Daylight Time,
catwhois@... writes:

> They are only in pain for a little
> while (we use homeopathic remedy to help eliminate the injection
> pain quickly)


Michelle,

I'd love to know more about your remedy. Care to share?

Thanks,
Carron
